title: CreatorofTronWinner
author: CreatorofTronWinner
content: *TRON Investment plan*:You need to have 300trx exacly to start and your business partners need to have 300trx aswell to invest.*Referral commission 70%*You earn 70% from each referral who join under you. 30% goes to system administration. In order to join with TRON BUSINESS you need to have Tron Business number so ask around once you get it then you can join and invest and you get your own TRON BUSINESS number aswell once you have your business number you just need to post it over the facebook or send directly your number to your business partners If they join and pay 300trx you earn 70% the 210 trx instantly. If you want that people join Under you than you could tell them that you give them some % back If they join or something it's up to you negoiate the deals with your business partners "Your Network Is Your Net Worth"Why it's best time to start with TRON ? not just Investment but earning by special way the TRON BUSINESS METHOD?Tron cryptocurrency one of the most used cryptocurrencies.Tron deflaton coming + huge tron buying demand so TRON price is predicted to go up üöÄ You could make more than 10x profit in few months.All payments are instantly into TRON wallets!To start your TRON Business you need to have:1. Have your uplink Tron Business number ready (your uplink business number of the person business number you join in )2. you need to have 300trx3.your tron wallet addressI give first few people the Free TRON BUSINESS NUMBER to start so you share your TRON BUSINESS NUMBER and people join Under you then you get instantly 70% of each 300trx in your wallet. We also have TRON BUSINESS live chatbox so people can talk and make connections.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: It's a pyramid scheme. No business here! The profit comes from new members and no service is provided.in practice only the top of the pyramid earn something, the others if they want to get something, they have to introduce 4 people to obtain a minimum profit :Oin short, no investment method but a simple pyramid scam.

And it's easy you get your business number you just post it and If anyone want they just join Under your business number and you get paid instantly 70%

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: A ponzi scheme is not a business, it's a scam. I strongly recommend avoiding such projects, especially this one.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: CreatorofTronWinner on December 13, 2023, 11:57:11 AMYou try to be funny ok .. anyways Also You are not funny at all, scammers here are not funny to anyone.But to clarify, you created an account and came here to offer get-rich-quick schemes. At the same time, all you have behind you is a newly created account here and two Telegram groups with 4 and 20 subscribers. There have been quite a few such attempts to extort money from scammers on this forum, some of them were much more sophisticated than yours. Fortunately, we all grew up here, so you'll have to look for victims elsewhere. Also, coming with alt accounts will not help you, but will only cause negative feedback on all connected accounts.So, this is your stupid idea to get money, but that doesn't mean you can't be wise and stop this.I will repost what inthelongrun says, there are never enough warnings about scammers.Quote from: inthelongrun on December 13, 2023, 11:13:41 AMWarning especially to newbies in crypto!BEWARE! THIS IS A SCAM!
